title: My account got deleted?
body: So I just logged back on, and it asked me to pick a new in game name, so I thought maybe I hadnt played in a while and it lost my name, so I entered a new one. Then it said what level rts player are you. I was confused but answered anyways. It made me level 1 and I had nothing. Runes champs, everything was gone. Can someone help me get my account back? It was SekondSlayer. I dont want to start over. Please help!

replies.body:
Accounts cannot be reset to level 1 like that, so it's likely you've logged into the wrong account. Most of the times when I've seen this exact issue, that is the case. 

If you can recall the email address you had associated with the account, you can attempt to recover the username for login with [this link.](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-username) Let me know if you have any questions.
